rows.label: qev035601_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah...rrrgh! Curse this injured leg![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0002
rows.name: ...Hmm? Is that you, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Your timing is good. Captain Slovity is about to do
something terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev035601_SEL0011
rows.name: Show concern for the injured Trigo.

rows.label: qev035601_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev035601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Trigo what happened.

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0004
rows.name: You are kind. But I am of no importance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0005
rows.name: All of Team Slovity at risk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0006
rows.name:
It happened suddenly. We were in training exercise
when Slovity went berserk. Started attacking us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0007
rows.name:
Then she ran off to northern mountains.
Now she attacks BLADEs who look for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0008
rows.name:
It was hard to leave Ganglion. But now we love NLA.
I not wish to lose that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0009
rows.name:
Captain Slovity would not want it either.
She must have reason for such actions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0010
rows.name: You must stop her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is good you are here. Captain told us of you.
Said to ask you for aid if anything happened to her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0012
rows.name: She trusts you, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_JNK0030
rows.name: Vow

rows.label: qev035601_SEL0031
rows.name: Promise to honor that trust.

rows.label: qev035601_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev035601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Trigo where Slovity went.

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0013
rows.name: I see she was right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Captain bought new type of protective gear.
One of Earth-alien make.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0015
rows.name:
She managed to defeat us with ease.
Even when we faced her as group.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0016
rows.name:
But you are strong. I know you can face her.
Go to Castaway Cavern. She makes her stand there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0017
rows.name:
I hear she takes shelter in Castaway Cavern.
But be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Captain bought new type of protective gear.
One of Earth-alien make.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0019
rows.name: She is stronger than last time you fought her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Captain was strong without protective gear.
With it, she is almost unstoppable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0021
rows.name:
We attacked together as group. She struck us down
like whelps. Dodged every round. We were powerless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0022
rows.name:
You are only one who can stop her.
Please go to Castaway Cavern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0023
rows.name:
You were slow to return. So others reequipped and left.
Set out to find you and captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0024
rows.name:
You must have passed without knowing.
Still, I am relieved you are safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now we just need Tree clansman to be quiet.
Then all will be well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0026
rows.name:
That Earth alien returned as soon as you left.
Sold us all new gear. Very cheap![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Others thought they could now bring captain home.
They set out while ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0028
rows.name:
Rrrgh... Captain was gone. They were my duty.
What was I thinking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0029
rows.name: They are back! All have returned![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0030
rows.name: You are truly great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0031
rows.name: ...I see. Teammates who died will be missed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035601_MSG0032
rows.name:
They followed Captain Slovity. Deserted Ganglion.
We will mourn them as brave warriors.[ST:wait ]
